description:
Connect to a computer remotely, be it from the other end of the office or halfway around the world. 
AnyDesk ensures secure and reliable remote desktop connections for IT professionals and on-the-go individuals alike.
	
If not parameters are specified, the package is portable. 

#### Package Parameters
The following package parameters can be set:

 * `/INSTALL` - Install the package to "C:\Program Files (x86)\AnyDesk\"
 * `/PATH:installdirectory` - Install the package to a custom directory
 * `/NOAUTOSTART` - Do not start anydesk at bootup (Implies install) 
 * `/NOSTARTMENU` - Do not create start menu icon during install (Implies install) 
 * `/DESKTOPICON` - Create a desktop icon during install (Implies install) 
 * `/UPDATETYPE:type` - Update `manually` , `disabled` , or `auto` Defaults to disabled (Implies install)

To pass parameters, use `--params "''"` (e.g. `choco install packageID [other options] --params="'/ITEM:value /ITEM2:value2 /FLAG_BOOLEAN'"`).
To have choco remember parameters on upgrade, be sure to set `choco feature enable -n=useRememberedArgumentsForUpgrades`.

**Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is
out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
author: AnyDesk Software GmbH
